summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of the alley in Block 11, Greene's Addition, being the alley between Boylston Avenue North and Franklin Avenue, from Louisa Street to East Lynn Street; by paving and otherwise improving the same, all in accordance with Majority Petition No. 89966 to the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
